                       <p id="ccpa">
                           <strong>ADDENDUM 1 - CALIFORNIA PRIVACY RIGHTS</strong>
                       </p>
                       <p>The terms of this Addendum apply to residents of California under the California Consumer Privacy Act of 2018 (California Civil Code &sect;&sect; 1798.100 to 1798.199) and its implementing regulations, as amended or superseded from time to time (&ldquo;CCPA&rdquo;). For the purposes of this addendum, Personal Information means information that identifies, relates to, describes, is reasonably capable of being associated with, or could reasonably be linked, directly or indirectly, with a particular consumer or household, or as otherwise defined by the CCPA. Personal Information does not include information that is: lawfully made available from government records, deidentified or aggregated, or otherwise excluded from the scope of the CCPA.</p>
                       <p>
                           <span>COLLECTION AND DISCLOSURE OF PERSONAL INFORMATION</span>
                       </p>
                       <p>Over the past 12 months, through your use of the Games, we may have collected and disclosed the following categories of Personal Information from or about you:</p>
                       <ul>
                           <li>Identifiers, including name, email address, IP address, device identifiers, advertising ID, Miniclip ID, and profile photos. This information is collected directly from you or your device. If you have registered through a third party account (Apple, Facebook, or Google), we may have also collected from those third party services your third party ID, name, and avatar.</li>
                           <li>Internet or other electronic network activity information, including your use of in-game features and events and information on your in-game activity, and information on your interactions with advertising shown in on our Games. This information is collected from our selected third party analytics providers and advertising partners.</li>
                           <li>Geolocation data, including city level location data. This information is collected directly from you or your device and from third party services when you register through them.</li>
                           <li>Commercial information, including records of products or services purchased, obtained, or considered, your Apple ID number for Apple, your postcode and state for Google and user ID and email address for Xsolla transactions. This information is collected directly from you or your device, and from our payment processors.</li>
                       </ul>
                       <p>In the preceding twelve months, we have collected Personal Information from the following categories of sources:</p>
                       <ol>
                           <li>You/Your Devices directly.</li>
                           <li>Advertising Networks and other advertising partners.</li>
                           <li>Analytics Providers.</li>
                           <li>Social Networks, to the extent this applies to you and within the limits of your permission.</li>
                       </ol>
                       <p>We collect personal information for the following purposes:</p>
                       <ul>
                           <li>To operate and administer the Games;</li>
                           <li>To improve the Games;</li>
                           <li>To communicate with you;</li>
                           <li>To serve advertising;</li>
                           <li>For security and verification purposes, including to prevent and detect fraudulent activity;</li>
                           <li>To address and remediate technical issues and bugs.</li>
                       </ul>
                       <p>
                           For additional information about what each type of personal information is used for, see &ldquo;
                           <a href="#personal-info-usage">
                               <span>How We Use Your Personal Information</span>
                           </a>&rdquo; in the main portion of the Privacy Policy.
                       </p>
                       <p>We may disclose personal information to the following types of entities:</p>
                       <ul>
                           <li>Other players and users who will see your profile information and in-game activities, as well as any other information you choose to share with them, such as chat data;</li>
                           <li>Our affiliate companies within our corporate group who process personal information in order to operate the Games;</li>
                           <li>Marketing and advertising partners who use your information to serve you ads in the Games and on other sites;</li>
                           <li>Other companies that provide services on our behalf who are prohibited by contract from retaining, using, or disclosing personal information for any purpose other than for providing the services to us;</li>
                           <li>Regulators, judicial authorities and law enforcement agencies;</li>
                           <li>Entities that acquire all or substantially all of our business.</li>
                       </ul>
                       <p>
                           For additional information about how we disclose personal information is used for, see &ldquo;
                           <a href="#personal-info-sharing">
                               <span>Who we share Your Personal Information With</span>
                           </a>&rdquo; in the main portion of the Privacy Policy.
                       </p>
                       <p>
                           <span>SALES OF PERSONAL INFORMATION / NOTICE OF RIGHT TO OPT-OUT</span>
                       </p>
                       <p>Over the past 12 months, we have used third party advertising and other tracking technologies on our Games to collect information about you, your device(s), and your use of our Games. We share that information with selected third parties such as advertising partners who use it to target advertisements to you online.</p>
                       <p>
                           You can opt-out and exercise control over the use of these technologies at any time by using the Privacy Settings, and, for certain of our Mobile Games, by adjusting the in-app settings. Alternatively, you can also submit your request to opt-out using our use our&nbsp;
                           <a data-bind="attr: { href: appViewModel.languagesPartial().currentLanguage().getSupportUrl() }">
                               <span>web form</span>
                           </a>.
                       </p>
                       <p>
                           <span>RIGHTS UNDER THE CCPA</span>
                       </p>
                       <p>The CCPA provides California residents with certain legal rights; these rights are not absolute and are subject to certain exemptions. If you are a California resident, and the CCPA does not recognize an exemption that applies to you or your personal information, you have the right to:</p>
                       <ul>
                           <li>Submit a verifiable request for the following information covering the 12 months preceding your request:</li>
                           <ul>
                               <li>the categories of Personal Information about you that we collected, sold, or disclosed;</li>
                               <li>the categories of sources from which the Personal Information was collected;</li>
                               <li>the purpose for collecting or selling Personal Information about you;</li>
                               <li>the categories of third parties to whom we disclosed Personal Information about you and the categories of Personal Information that was disclosed (if applicable) and the purpose for disclosing the Personal Information about you; and</li>
                               <li>the specific pieces of Personal Information we collected about you;</li>
                           </ul>
                           <li>Submit a verifiable request that we delete Personal Information we collected from you; and</li>
                           <li>Be free from unlawful discrimination for exercising your rights, including providing a different level or quality of services or deny goods or services to you when you exercise your rights under the CCPA, subject to certain limitations.</li>
                       </ul>
                       <p>We aim to fulfil all verified requests within 45 days pursuant to the CCPA. If necessary, extensions for an additional 45 days will be accompanied by an explanation for the delay.</p>
                       <p>
                           <span>HOW TO EXERCISE YOUR RIGHTS</span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                           You can exercise your rights by using our web form (and choosing: Type of issue &lsquo;Related to my account&rsquo; &gt; &lsquo;I have data related question&rsquo;) or by emailing us at&nbsp;
                           <a href="mailto:dataprotection@miniclip.com">
                               <span>dataprotection@miniclip.com</span>
                           </a>.
                       </p>
                       <p>If you wish to opt-out or update your preferences, you may do so in the Privacy Settings of our Website, and in-app for certain of our Mobile Games.</p>
                       <p>
                           <span>VERIFICATION</span>
                       </p>
                       <p>Requests for access to or deletion of Personal Information, whether submitted by you directly or via an authorized agent, are subject to our ability to reasonably verify your identity in light of the information requested and pursuant to relevant CCPA requirements, limitations, and regulations. To verify your access or deletion request, please be prepared to provide us with identifying information (such as your User ID, Game name etc.) that and we can match against our records in order to confirm you are the rightful account holder.</p>
                       <p>
                           <span>AUTHORIZING AN AGENT</span>
                       </p>
                       <p>
                           To authorize an agent to make a request to know or delete or opt out on your behalf, please email us at&nbsp;
                           <a href="mailto:dataprotection@miniclip.com">
                               <span>dataprotection@miniclip.com</span>
                           </a>.
                       </p>
                       <p>
                           <span>SHINE THE LIGHT</span>
                       </p>
                       <p>We do not rent, sell, or share Personal Information with nonaffiliated companies for their direct marketing uses as contemplated by California&rsquo;s &ldquo;Shine the Light&rdquo; law (Civil Code &sect; 1798.83), unless we have your permission.</p>
                       <p>
                           <span>DO NOT TRACK</span>
                       </p>
                       <p>There is no accepted standard on how to respond to Do Not Track signals, and we do not respond to such signals.</p>

We suggest you read app store terms carefully and follow the process provided by the relevant app store.</p>

                               <p>We do not permit third parties to give or sell Coins and other Virtual Items outside of our games. Accordingly, as a condition to playing our games, you agree not to receive, purchase and/or use Coins or Virtual Items from such third parties. Any unauthorised Coins or Virtual Items that you purchase are subject to forfeiture at any time.</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>
                                       <strong>3. I am ready to buy Virtual Items &ndash; what do I need to do?</strong>
                                   </li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>You can buy Virtual Items from us for real money if you are 18 years of age or older or, if you are under 18, you must have the permission of a parent or guardian. We may ask you to provide the details of your parent or guardian from time to time.</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>If you want to buy any Virtual Items, please follow the steps set out in the game which you have downloaded. If you experience any difficulties when purchasing Virtual Items, you can contact us <span>here.</span></p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>Please note the following:</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>
                                       You may be presented with multiple Virtual Items bundles and/or packages, with different virtual currency options if applicable, and with different prices and amounts of Virtual Items to choose from. Please select the bundle or package that you wish to purchase, review this selection and, if you are happy, please proceed to check out. If you are purchasing Virtual Items through the Website, or other dedicated websites (such as&nbsp;
                                       <a href="https://en.onlinesoccermanager.com/Register">
                                           <span class="s1">https://en.onlinesoccermanager.com/Register</span>
                                       </a>), you will automatically be redirected to our third-party payment provider website. If you are purchasing Virtual Items through the app, your payment will be processed through the applicable app store and additional app store terms and conditions may apply.
                                   </li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>The price of Virtual Items is as stated at the time you place your order, except in the case of obvious error. We try and ensure that all prices stated are accurate but errors may occur. The price includes value added tax (where applicable).</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>We are entitled to change the purchase price for Virtual Items at any time, before you purchase the Virtual Items. At the time of purchase of Virtual Items, you may be offered additional Virtual Items free of charge. These Virtual Items Terms cover such additional Virtual Items offered free of charge. Subject to applicable law and regulation, the price of Virtual Items may vary between users depending on a number of factors including differing exchange rates, territories and legal limitations.</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>If you are purchasing Virtual Items through a third-party payment provider window, you will be asked to select your preferred payment method. Note that such payment methods are subject to change at the discretion of Gamebasics and the third-party payment provider.</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>Please select the payment method that you wish to use by clicking on the relevant icon. By doing so you confirm that you are authorised to use the payment method selected. You will then be asked to provide certain required information to purchase the Virtual Items. If you are paying by credit card please enter the number in full, without spaces or dashes. All credit/debit card holders are subject to validation checks and authorisation by the card issuer. If the issuer of your card refuses to authorise payment we will not accept your Virtual Item order and we are not obliged to inform you of the reason for the refusal.</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>We are not responsible for your card issuer or bank charging you as a result of the processing of your credit/debit card payment in accordance with your order. Before placing and submitting an order for Virtual Items, you will be provided with details of the terms and conditions of our third-party payment provider. You will need to read and accept these terms and conditions before purchasing the Virtual Items through our third-party payment provider.</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>Please check the accuracy of the payment information that you have provided and correct any mistakes. When you are ready, please click to submit your order. By doing so you: (i) agree to be bound by the Terms and these Virtual Items Terms; (ii) agree to pay for the Virtual Items at the indicated price, and you (iii) confirm that you are permitted to use the payment source that you have provided; and (iv) you authorise our designated payment processor to charge the full amount to the payment source you have identified for the transaction.</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>Once you have placed your order, you will receive a confirmation on screen.</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>All purchased or allocated Virtual Items will be assigned to the account that is linked with the payment provider through which the purchase or allocation is made. It is your responsibility to ensure that you are logged in to the correct account when making a purchase.</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>Gamebasics does not process payments. A third-party payment provider or the app store itself (such as Apple or Google Play Store) handles payments. If you have any issues or problems with payment for a Virtual Item, you should therefore contact the third-party payment provider or the app store directly.</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>
                                       <strong>4. Can I transfer Virtual Items between app and Website accounts?</strong>
                                   </li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>Generally, no. The app and website accounts are not always linked, but in some cases<strong>, </strong>such as for Online Soccer Manager the Coin wallets are linked. However, for some games there is no link, and if you purchase Virtual Items through one platform account, they will not appear in other platform accounts you may have with us.</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>
                                       <strong>5. How do I use my Virtual Items?</strong>
                                   </li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>You can spend your Coins in order to acquire other Virtual Items within the game within which you purchased the Coins. When you use Coins to acquire another Virtual Item within a game, the relevant amount of Coins will automatically be deducted from your account that is connected with that game.</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>Other than Coins, the availability, nature and duration of any Virtual Items may vary from time to time. Some Virtual Items may only be used a limited number of times or only whilst you satisfy certain conditions.</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>We can at any time, without notifying you, vary the scope, variety and type of Virtual Items. Gamebasics has no obligation to make, or continue to make, any specific Virtual Item for any game. We may also restrict or vary the type of Virtual Items available to you based on your country of residence.</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>
                                       <strong>6. What am I not allowed to do with my Virtual Items?</strong>
                                   </li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>By buying Virtual Items, you agree not to:</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>transfer Virtual Items between accounts or between you and any other person, except for any Gamebasics authorized and enabled transfers;</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>transfer or attempt to transfer Virtual Items between two or more accounts in any way; or</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>transfer Virtual Items between accounts by any means that attempts to bypass normal playing rules or that is contrary to the general purpose of a game (for example: by using one account to intentionally lose a game to another account for the purpose of transferring credits between the accounts).</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>Users are prohibited from holding and using Virtual Items in multiple accounts in any manner that is contrary to the general purpose of a game and in violation of any relevant clauses of these Terms and Conditions.</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>You are strictly prohibited from giving, selling or otherwise transferring an account or any Virtual Items to any other person. Any violation or abuse of the account limitations will be flagged and may result in suspending or disabling your account or any other measures Gamebasics deems necessary.</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>We may from time to time limit the use of Virtual Items, including applying limits to the number of Virtual Items allocated to your account at any time, and/or the number of Virtual Items usable or redeemable within a given time period.</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li><strong>7. What legal terms do I need to be aware of when I am purchasing Virtual Items?</strong><br/> <br/> When you buy Virtual Items, you are buying a limited personal revocable licence to use the Virtual Items. You agree that the Virtual Items do not constitute personal property and Coins are not legal tender or currency of any kind.&nbsp;All Virtual Items purchased by you are non-refundable.&nbsp;No interest is paid or earned on any Coins balance.<br/> <br/> Gamebasics is entitled to expire, withdraw, replace, restrict or otherwise change any Virtual Item at any time.</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>You have certain rights in respect of the Virtual Items. These include that we have the right to supply the Virtual Items to you and that the Virtual Items will be of satisfactory quality and as described.</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>You have certain legal remedies if we breach any of these rights. Nothing in these Virtual Items Terms is intended to affect these legal rights or other rights to which you may also be entitled.</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>
                                   If we are unable to resolve any disputes between us about your purchase of the Virtual Items or these Virtual Items Terms, you have the right to refer the dispute to the EU's Online Dispute Resolution platform at&nbsp;
                                   <a href="https://webgate.ec.europa.eu/odr/main/index.cfm?event=main.home.chooseLanguage">
                                       <span class="s1">https://webgate.ec.europa.eu/odr/main/index.cfm?event=main.home.chooseLanguage</span>
                                   </a>.
                               </p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>
                                       <strong>8. Can I cancel my order once I have bought my Virtual Items?</strong>
                                   </li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>By purchasing Virtual Items from us, you agree that we can transfer them to your account as soon as we can. By agreeing to these Terms, each time you click to confirm a purchase, you acknowledge that you expressly consent to the supply of the Virtual Items immediately and acknowledge that you will lose your right to change your mind and cancel such order within the 14-day cooling-off period otherwise provided by law.</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>
                                       <strong>9. What happens to my Virtual Items if my account is temporarily or permanently terminated?</strong>
                                   </li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>We reserve the right to temporarily or permanently ban your account if:</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>we or our designated payment processor are unable to verify or authenticate any information (including payment information) you provide in connection with the purchase or use of the relevant Virtual Items;</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>we or our designated payment processor are notified of or reasonably suspects any cheating, fraudulent, abusive or other unlawful activity whatsoever in relation to your account, Virtual Items or Coins balance;</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>you are otherwise in breach of these Virtual Items Terms, the terms of the third-party payment service provider or any other Terms; or</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>your account is inactive for a period of 3 years.</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>If we temporarily or permanently ban your account, we may remove any or all of the Virtual Items in your account. If this happens, you are not entitled to any reimbursement, refund or any other compensation, except at our sole discretion.</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>
                                       <strong>10. What do I do if I have not received my Virtual Items?</strong>
                                   </li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>It is possible that you have successfully ordered and paid for your Coins, but you may not have received them. Please remember that during busy periods, it can take up to 48 hours before your Virtual Items are assigned to your account. If you are still having issues receiving your Virtual Items and you have not received them after a short period of time, please let us know by contacting us <span>here.</span></p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>
                                       <strong>11. What should I do if someone has made an unauthorised purchase on my account?</strong>
                                   </li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>You are responsible for the security of your account and ensuring that no unauthorised purchases occur on your account. Gamebasics is not liable for any unauthorised purchases (including fraudulent purchases or purchases made by minors). If you wish to pursue a refund for such purchases, you should contact your bank or the payment provider such as the relevant app store.</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>
                                       <strong>12. What is Gamebasics not responsible for?</strong>
                                   </li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>We are not responsible for the following types of loss or damage which may arise (and have no obligation to refund for any purchase of Virtual Items):</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>damage or loss not caused by our breach of the Virtual Items Terms;</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>unauthorised purchases made by persons who have gained access to your account (including, without limitation, minors or unauthorised third parties);</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>loss of progress or Virtual Items on your guest account which you can no longer access. We advise you to create a proper account and/or to link your account to Facebook to minimise loss of your account data;</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>loss of progress or Virtual Items due to disconnecting your game account from a social media account (such as Google or Facebook);</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>loss or liability incurred by you as a result of accidentally entering a match or purchasing a Virtual Item through misclick or other mistake;</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>loss of progress or Virtual Items as a result of our decision to terminate a game or remove certain features or supporting services from a game;</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>loss or damage which is caused by us when such use does not comply with the Virtual Items Terms but which we and you could not anticipate nor expect to happen when you started using the Virtual Items;</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>any loss which is indirect or a side effect of the main loss or damage and which we and you could not anticipate nor expect to happen when you started using the Virtual Items, for instance if you lose revenue or salary, profit, opportunity or reputation; and</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>any loss or damage if the Virtual Items are not provided to you are interrupted or suspended or if we do not comply with the Virtual Items Terms because of events beyond our control, such as an act of God, accident, fire, lockout, strike or other official or unofficial labour dispute, civil commotion or other act or event beyond our reasonable control.</li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <ul>
                                   <li>
                                       <strong>13. Who do I contact regarding purchases of Virtual Items in Facebook Messenger?</strong>
                                   </li>
                               </ul>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>Purchases of Virtual Items made within Facebook's Messenger application are subject solely to Facebook's terms and conditions of purchase. Accordingly, we will be unable to help with your queries here which should be directed to Facebook.</p>
                               <p>&nbsp;</p>
                               <p>Gamebasics B.V. is a wholly owned subsidiary of Miniclip Group S.A.</p>
                               </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div></div></div></div></script>

    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function () {
            //When initialized in the header the banner won't be appended to the document before editing
            //Properties from the banner that aren't inialized are hidden from the user
            var smartBanner = new SmartBanner({
                title: "OSM",
                author: "FREE download - Try our native app for an even better game experience!",
                button: "Play"
            });

            //Needs to check if the ios banner exists. Otherwise it's not possible to add click events to the buttons that fix the layout
            if ($(".smartbanner") && $(".smartbanner").length) {

                // Replace the href attribute so that it uses our custom adjust link.
                $(".smartbanner .smartbanner-button").attr("href", "https://osm-link.onelink.me/MfGK/gvg7xw1n");

                //If there are no cookies named ... then the banner will show and spacing will be added to the headers
                if ($(".smartbanner").hasClass("smartbanner-ios") && !$.cookie("smartbanner-closed") && !$.cookie("smartbanner-installed")) {
                    //If there is a ios banner, add class to the body to move the headers and content below the banner
                    $("body").addClass("has-smart-banner");
                    //Add events to the ios banner buttons to move the headers back to the top of the page
                    $(".smartbanner-button, .smartbanner-close").click(function() { $("body").removeClass("has-smart-banner"); });
                }
                // Both banners need to change the cookie time when they're pressed
                // Force cookies expiration date to 30 minutes from the moment when pressed
                $(".smartbanner-button").click(function() {
                    $.cookie("smartbanner-installed", true, { expires: new Date(new Date().getTime() + (30 * 60 * 1000)) });
                });

                $(".smartbanner-close").click(function() {
                    $.cookie("smartbanner-closed", true, { expires: new Date(new Date().getTime() + (30 * 60 * 1000)) });
                });
            }
        });
    </script>

<script id="modal-trainplayer" type="text/html"><div class="modal" data-bind="css: classes"><div aria-label="Close" class="close-large animated fadeInDown" data-bind="visible: options().showCloseButtonLarge, click: closeButtonClicked" data-dismiss="modal"></div><div class="modal-backdrop fade in" ></div><canvas id="modal-canvas" ></canvas><div class="modal-dialog-fixed-header  modal-dialog" id="modal-dialog-trainplayer"><div class="modal-content"><button aria-label="Close" class="close" data-bind="visible: options().showCloseButton, click: closeButtonClicked" data-dismiss="modal" type="button"><span aria-hidden="true">&times;</span></button>    <div class="modal-header theme-panna-0">
        <div>
            <div class="font-lg semi-bold">Select a player to train</div>
            <div class="modal-subheader">Tip: a player will learn less from multiple training sessions on the same day!</div>
        </div>

                        <th class="hidden-xs text-left">Status</th>
                        <th class="th-unsortable">Training progression</th>
                    </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody data-bind="foreach: getItems()">
                    <tr class="player-table-row" data-bind="click: $root.setPlayer.bind($root, $data, '{Player} is starting', 'Players can\'t be in the starting Line-up and train at the same time. Do you want to remove {Player} from the starting XI?'), css: { 'world-star-table-row': isWorldStar(), 'in-form-table-row': isInForm(), 'legend-table-row': isLegend(), disabled: isInjured(), clickable: !isInjured() }, secondCss: getWorldStarClassName()">
                        <td class="text-left vertical-center no-wrap">
                            <div class="inline-block icon-shirt" data-bind="css: { 'icon-shirt-blue': isInLineup(), 'icon-shirt-grey': isInSelection() && !isInLineup(), 'icon-shirt-training': isInTraining(), 'icon-shirt-unassigned': !isInLineup() && !isInSelection(), 'icon-goalkeeper': isGoalKeeper }">
                                <span data-bind="text: squadOrLineupNumber()"></span>
                            </div>
                            <div class="inline-block">
                                <bdi><span class="semi-bold" data-bind="text: name"></span>&nbsp;<span class="font-xs" data-bind="braces: age"></span></bdi>
                            </div>
<!-- ko if: isLegend() -->                                <span class="icon-legend flex-pull-right" title="Legend"></span>
<!-- /ko -->                            <!-- ko if: isInForm() -->                                <span class="icon-in-form flex-pull-right" title="In Form"></span>
<!-- /ko -->                        </td>
                        <td class="td-content-width" >
                            <!-- ko if: specificPosition === PlayerSpecificPosition.GK -->GK<!-- /ko --><!-- ko if: specificPosition === PlayerSpecificPosition.RB -->RB<!-- /ko --><!-- ko if: specificPosition === PlayerSpecificPosition.CB -->CB<!-- /ko --><!-- ko if: specificPosition === PlayerSpecificPosition.LB -->LB<!-- /ko --><!-- ko if: specificPosition === PlayerSpecificPosition.RM -->RM<!-- /ko --><!-- ko if: specificPosition === PlayerSpecificPosition.CDM -->CDM<!-- /ko --><!-- ko if: specificPosition === PlayerSpecificPosition.CM -->CM<!-- /ko --><!-- ko if: specificPosition === PlayerSpecificPosition.CAM -->CAM<!-- /ko --><!-- ko if: specificPosition === PlayerSpecificPosition.LM -->LM<!-- /ko --><!-- ko if: specificPosition === PlayerSpecificPosition.RF -->RW<!-- /ko --><!-- ko if: specificPosition === PlayerSpecificPosition.ST -->ST<!-- /ko --><!-- ko if: specificPosition === PlayerSpecificPosition.LF -->LW<!-- /ko -->
                        </td>
                        <td class="hidden-xs td-content-width text-center"><span class="flag-icon" data-bind="css: 'flag-icon-' + nationality.code.toLowerCase(), attr: { title: nationality.name }"></span></td>
                        <td class="hidden-xs td-content-width text-right" data-bind="text: statAtt, css: { 'semi-bold': isAttacker }"></td>
                        <td class="hidden-xs td-content-width text-right" data-bind="text: statDef, css: { 'semi-bold': (isGoalKeeper || isDefender) }"></td>
                        <td class="hidden-xs td-content-width text-right" data-bind="text: statOvr, css: { 'semi-bold': isMidfielder }"></td>
                        <td class="hidden-xs td-player-status text-left">
<!-- ko if: isInjured() || injuryPartial() -->                                <span class="icon-player-injury"></span>
<!-- /ko -->                            <!-- ko if: doctorTreatmentPartial() -->                                <span class="icon-player-doctortreatment"></span>
<!-- /ko -->                            <!-- ko if: isSuspended() -->                                <span class="icon-player-redcard"></span>

<!-- /ko -->                            <!-- ko if: isOnTransferList() -->                                <span class="icon-player-forsale"></span>
<!-- /ko -->                            <!-- ko ifnot: isSuspended() --><!-- ko if: yellowCards > 1 -->                                    <span class="icon-player-yellowcards"></span>
<!-- /ko --><!-- ko if: yellowCards === 1 -->                                    <span class="icon-player-yellowcard"></span>
<!-- /ko --><!-- /ko -->                        </td>
                        <td class="semi-bold td-content-width text-right visible-xs" data-bind="text: statMain"></td>
<!-- ko if: !isInjured() --><!-- ko with: trainingProgressPartial -->                                <td>    
                                    <div class="progress training-progress" data-bind="css: { 'will-level-up': willLevelUp() }">
                                        <div class="player-progress-bar-progress-text text-shadow semi-bold center">
                                            <span data-bind="htmlWithBinding: '+<span data-bind=\'number: textualForecastPercentage()\'></span>%'"></span>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="progress-bar" data-bind="widthPercent: progressPercentage"></div>
                                        <div class="progress-bar forecast" data-bind="widthPercent: forecastPercentage"></div>
                                    </div>
                                </td>
<!-- /ko --><!-- /ko -->                        <!-- ko if: isInjured -->                            <td>Injured</td>
<!-- /ko -->                    </tr>
                </tbody>
            </table>
<!-- /ko -->    </div>
</div></div></div></script>

<script id="modal-helptext" type="text/html"><div class="modal modal-v2" data-bind="css: classes"><div class="modal-backdrop fade in" ></div><div class="modal-dialog" id="modal-dialog-helptext"><div class="modal-shadow" ></div><div class="modal-wave" ></div><div class="close-button-container"><button aria-label="Close" class="close" data-bind="visible: options().showCloseButton, click: closeButtonClicked" data-dismiss="modal" type="button"><span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-times"></span></button></div><div class="row row-h-xs-24 overflow-visible modal-content-container"><div class="theme-panna-1 modal-assistent col-xs-12 col-h-xs-24 modal-content"><div class="row row-h-xs-24 no-padding modal-scrollable-content-container">    <div class="modal-body">
    <div class="modal-header">

            </h3>

                Looking for some experts?
            </h3>
<!-- /ko -->    </div>
    <div class="modal-body">
<!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.TicketQualification -->            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-12 center">
                    <div class="inline-block icon-ticket-large"></div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row">
                <div class="col-xs-12">
                    <p>Competing in the Winners Cup is the ultimate challenge for every manager. Only the best-performing clubs get a Ticket to enter this tournament. To obtain a Ticket, you have to play in one of the most prestigious Leagues, and finish the Season among the highest on the League Table. With a Ticket, you can take your powerful team and queue it up for a place in an upcoming Winners Cup. You will play against other managers who have tried their best to build up their team to its highest potential!</p>
                </div>
            </div>
<!-- /ko -->        <!-- ko ifnot: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.TicketQualification -->            <div class="row help-text-modal-content-row">
                <div class="col-xs-12">
<!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.ChooseLeagueBeta -->                        <p>The competitions you can choose here are in beta. That means that they are not quite done yet, and they're still being improved before an official release. Until then, you can already try them out, but you should expect a suboptimal experience and bugs while playing in these competitions.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.Transferlist -->                        <p>The Transfer List. The place where you can buy new players. There are players on there that were added by opponents in your own league but also players from abroad.</p>
                        <p>You can add players to the Transfer List via your Squad. The cheaper the player you add to the Transfer List, the sooner he will be sold.</p>
                        <p>Selling and buying players is a great way to make Club Funds. You can add a maximum of 4 players at the same time to the Transfer List.</p>
                        <p>All your current player negotiations are listed under 'Negotiations'. You can find an overview of all concluded transfers under 'Transfers'.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.Training -->                        <p>This is your Training. Four coaches are always ready to help you improve your players' progress and quality.</p>
                        <p>Every training session will take 8 hours to complete. A coach can only train players in his specialty.</p>
                        <p>Your attacking coach will improve your forwards' attacking qualities, your midfielder coach will handle your midfielders' overall quality, your defending coach will target your defenders' defending qualities and your goalkeeping coach will concentrate on your goalkeepers' defending qualities.</p>
                        <p>If you want to boost a training session immediately, you can use your Boss Coins to instantly train your player.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.TicketQueued -->                        <p>You're already queued up for another competition! You can only queue up with one ticket at a time. You can use another ticket after you get assigned a competition for the ticket that is currently queued up.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.Ticket -->                        <p>Competing in the Winners Cup is the ultimate challenge for every manager. Only the best-performing clubs get a Ticket to enter this tournament. To obtain a Ticket, you have to play in one of the most prestigious Leagues, and finish the Season among the highest on the League Table. With a Ticket, you can take your powerful team and queue it up for a place in an upcoming Winners Cup. You will play against other managers who have tried their best to build up their team to its highest potential!</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.TicketCreated -->                        <p>This team is still active in another manager slot! Please wait for that season to finish. You can still improve your team over there, before they can move on to the Winners Cup!</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.Tactics -->                        <p>Shape your team's Tactics. The Game plan is the most important tactical choice. Your Game plan should match with your Formation.</p>
                        <p>Use your line tactics to give each line of players instructions. Marking covers how to stop your opponent's forwards from scoring.</p>
                        <p>Decide on whether your defenders should use the Offside trap. Match your Tackling with the referee's strictness the upcoming match.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.Stadium -->                        <p>Welcome to your Stadium. It consists of three parts: capacity, pitch and training. Expanding your Stadium will give you great financial and competitive advantages!</p>
                        <p>Every expansion will take 18 hours. You can only expand one part of your Stadium at the same time.</p>
                        <p>The capacity part ensures more income from gate receipts, the pitch improves your chance of winning during home matches while training increases your players' progress in Training.</p>
                        <p>If you want to build an expansion immediately, you can use your Boss Coins to instantly finish an expansion.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.Squad -->                        <p>Welcome to Squad, an overview of all players, their statistics and their status.</p>
                        <p>The players' qualities are divided in attacking, defending and overall qualities. The highlighted quality is the most important for that position.</p>
                        <p>There are also the fitness and morale bars. Fitness and morale both have a big impact on the players' performance during matches.</p>
                        <p>In your own Squad you can add players to the Transfer List by tapping the player and assign squad numbers by tapping the shirt.</p>
                        <p>When you visit the Squad from another team, you can make offers for their players by tapping them.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.Spy -->                        <p>Welcome to the world of Data. Here you can find out all kinds of valuable information about your opponents.</p>
                        <p>The Data Analyst can discover the tactics, line up and stadium information of your opponents. He can also tell you if your opponent has gone on training camp. Unfortunately, if an opponent has planned a secret training, your Data Analyst cannot retrieve information about this opponent for you.</p>
                        <p>If you want his report immediately, you can use your Boss Coins or watch a video to instantly finish the case.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.Sponsor -->                        <p>All your stands are available for sponsoring. The number of Club Funds a sponsor is offering depends on your objective.</p>
                        <p>Moreover, the sponsor deals are getting better when you are above your objective. And of course, worse when you are below your objecitve.</p>
                        <p>So make sure you pick your sponsor deals wisely to earn as much Club Funds as possible!</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.OccupiedForWinnersLeague -->                        <p>The Winners Cup starts automatically when enough managers have claimed their ticket.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.NextWinnersLeague -->                        <p>Congratulations! You've had an amazing performance this season, and as a reward, you can take your powerful team with you to compete in the Winners Cup. When this season comes to an end, you will be able to enter the Winners Cup. In the meantime you can train one of your players to build your team even stronger!</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.NextCareerStep -->                        <p>When this timer hits zero, you officially completed this competition with your team.</p>
                        <p>After that, new clubs will be standing in line to sign you as their manager.</p>
                        <p>Good luck at your next team!</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.Lineup -->                        <p>This is where you decide who plays. You can also choose your formation, see player statistics and select who's on the bench.</p>
                        <p>Higher quality players will perform the best. It's also important to watch the age balance. As well as the fitness and morale of the players.</p>
                        <p>Every player also has secondary qualities. This can help linking the player to the Line tactics you use.</p>
                        <p>You can check the statistics, secondary qualities and morale and fitness via the different icons.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.Lawyer -->                        <p>Welcome to the court room. This is where your Lawyer can appeal your player's suspensions with the Association.</p>
                        <p>Your Lawyer can appeal suspensions with more than 1 match. The Association only allows 1 appeal per case.</p>
                        <p>If you want to finish an appeal immediately, you can use your Boss Coins to instantly appeal the case. </p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.GenericVipTicket -->                        <p>The VIP League is a unique league that you can only play when you have received a personal invitation. With the ticket below you have access to this league, so don't wait any longer and play the league! 

If you manage to win this league, you will be in the Hall of Fame among the best managers of the game!</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.Doctor -->                        <p>Step into your doctor's practice. Every player with an injury of 1 or more matchdays will end up here.</p>
                        <p>Your Doctor can treat every player. Treatment will reduce the injury with 1 matchday.</p>
                        <p>If you want to finish a treatment immediately, you can use your Boss Coins to instantly treat the player.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.CrewLandingPage -->                        <p>This is where you can join or create a Crew! We've recommended some Crews for you to join.</p>
                        <p>You can also create your own Crew if you want to decide on the membership, avatar, background and hierarchy!</p>
                        <p>Team up with your Friends and see how high up in the Ranking you can get your Crew!</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.Calendar -->                        <p>This is the last day of your league. On this day you can claim your earned trophies, manager points and Boss Coins.</p>
                        <p>There's also an overview of all season statistics: top scorers, most assists, highest value and more. No match will be played on this day.</p>
                        <p>After the simulation on this day, you can choose a new club to manage.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.BusinessClub -->                        <p>Welcome to the business side of football. Check out awesome business offers and watch videos for free Boss Coins. </p>
                        <p>Business isn't always booming. When there are no offers available, you can come back later. </p>
                        <p>Keep in mind that it can take some time before your Boss Coins are transferred to you.</p>
                        <p>If you completed an offer and didn't receive your Boss Coins or want to check your offer's status, you can tap on the business man and use 'Support' or 'Missing Boss Coins'.</p>
                        <p>Promo codes can be obtained through special events. Keep an eye out for our social media channels and updates.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.VipHallOfFame -->                        <p>You can earn a place in the Hall of Fame by winning a VIP League. The VIP League is a competition to which you must either be specially invited or for which you can qualify. This Hall of Fame is sorted by squad value on the last day of the competition.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.SquadStrengthOpponentHelpText -->                        <p>To set the tactics for the next match as good as possible, it is important to know how strong the opponent is. Use your Data Analyst to find out.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.SquadStrengthHelpText -->                        <p>The strength of your squad is important to win matches. Buy new players or train your current players to improve your squad strength.</p>
<!-- /ko -->
<!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.SkillRatingHelpText -->                        <p>There are many ways to see how you perform as a manager. You can view the Ranking, Trophy Cabinet and World Domination.</p>
                        <p>Manager Medals can be earned by playing matches during your Season. You can also earn different bonuses in a match*. After each match you will see an overview of the Manager Medals and bonuses you have earned.</p>
                        <p>On your Career overview you will find in which Division you are in based on the number of Manager Medals you have earned. The more Manager Medals you earn, the higher the Division you end up in. Lose too many Manager Medals and you could end up dropping down a Division.</p>
                        <p>*</p>
                        <p>- Match Bonus: the amount of Manager Medals you receive depends on whether you win, draw or lose. Playing against active managers increases the reward.</p>
                        <p>- More experienced manager: when you win or draw against a manager with more Manager Medals.</p>
                        <p>- Less experienced manager: when you draw or lose against a manager with less Manager Medals.</p>
                        <p>- Played against team with better Line-up: when your opponent's Line-up is better, you will get a bonus.</p>
                        <p>- Season performance bonus: a bonus for your performance during the season. Winning more matches and outperforming your goal will increase the reward.</p>
                        <p>- Cup performance bonus: a bonus for your performance in the Cup. Maximize your reward by winning the Cup.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.OccupiedForFantasyLeague -->                        <p>The Fantasy League can't begin until all teams are ready! If you still have to put together your team, this is only possible via the OSM apps.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.FantasyLeagueNotSupported -->                        <p>You cant join this League, because you can only join a Fantasy League in the OSM apps.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.LeaderBoardsHelpText -->                        <p>On this screen you will find Ranking Lists. The tabs Manager Ranking, Global and Country are sorted according to the number of Manager Medals of a manager.</p>
                        <p>The Hall of Fame is sorted according to the Squad value on the last day of a competition in the VIP League.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.FantasyLeague -->                        <p>The Fantasy League is all about football knowledge. You can put together your own team based on a maximum budget.

Assemble your team now and beat the assembled teams of other managers!</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.PrizePoolHelpText -->                        <p>To compete in a Knockout Royale Tournament and have a chance of winning the Prize Pool, you must contribute with a Boss Coin fee.

In Knockout Royale you compete in a single-elimination setting, where you are instantly knocked out of the Tournament when you lose a match.

The Prize Pool is determined by the amount of Boss Coins contributed and divided among the finalists, semi-finalists, quarter-finalists and round of 16's. Fight to be the last team standing!</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.PrizePoolNotSupported -->                        <p>You cant join this Tournament, because you can only join this Tournament in the OSM apps.</p>
                        <div class="row overflow-visible">
                            <div class="col-xs-12 center" id="help-text-store-buttons">
<!-- ko with: appViewModel.languagesPartial().getCurrentLanguage() -->    <a id="play-store-button" class="store-button" href="https://osm-link.onelink.me/MfGK/gvg7xw1n" target="_blank"><img border="0" data-bind="inlineImage: googlePlayStoreImageUrl" /></a>
    <a id="app-store-button" class="store-button" href="https://osm-link.onelink.me/MfGK/gvg7xw1n" target="_blank"><img border="0" data-bind="inlineImage: appStoreImageUrl" /></a>
<!-- /ko -->                            </div>
                        </div>
<!-- /ko -->                    
<!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.ChooseLeagueA -->                        <p>Here you can choose a competition to manage in. The featured competitions are very popular but you can also check out more than 150 other competitions. After you choose a competition, you can choose a team to manage.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    
<!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.InPrizePoolQueueHelpText -->                        <p>Knockout Royale starts automatically when all managers have signed a contract.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    
<!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.TacticsStyleOfPlay -->                        <p>Your Game plan is essential to success. Be sure to match it with your formation. I wouldn't use a defensive Game plan with an attacking formation.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.TacticsTackling -->                        <p>Your Tackling is crucial. The harder you tackle, the more chance you'll have to win. But it will also increase the chance of getting red cards, depending on the referee strictness. I wouldn't go reckless with a trigger-happy referee.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.TacticsLineTactics -->                        <p>Tuning your Line tactics is important. Match the attacking drive of your lines with its secondary qualities. I wouldn't set an attacking line with a lot of defending secondary qualities.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.TacticsSliderPressing -->                        <p>The right Pressing adds to your winning chances. How much Pressure you apply should depend on your Game plan. I wouldn't apply low pressure with attacking plans.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.TacticsSliderStyle -->                        <p>Style decides the flow of the match. Whether you play defensive or offensive should depend on your formation. I wouldn't play defensively with attacking formations.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.TacticsSliderTempo -->                        <p>Tempo is about the intensity of your match. It should match with the quality of your opponent. I wouldn't play high Tempo against a better opponent.</p>
<!-- /ko -->                    <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.TacticsOffsideTrap -->                        <p>Your view on the Offside trap contributes to solid defensive play. Every team needs their star player, crosser, clean finisher and leader. These players can make a difference for your team by leading through example. So choose your Specialists wisely!</p>

<script id="modal-pm" type="text/html"><div class="modal modal-v2" data-bind="css: classes"><div class="modal-backdrop fade in" ></div><div class="modal-dialog" id="modal-dialog-pm"><div class="modal-shadow" ></div><div class="modal-wave" ></div><div class="close-button-container"><button aria-label="Close" class="close" data-bind="visible: options().showCloseButton, click: closeButtonClicked" data-dismiss="modal" type="button"><span aria-hidden="true" class="fa fa-times"></span></button></div><div class="row row-h-xs-24 overflow-visible modal-content-container"><div class="theme-panna-1 col-xs-12 col-h-xs-24 modal-content"><div class="row row-h-xs-24 no-padding modal-scrollable-content-container">    <div id="pm-modal" class="row row-h-sm-24 modal-body clearfix" data-bind="click: closeSmileyPicker.bind($data)">

                <div class="button-conversation-add"></div>
            </a>
<!-- /ko -->        <!-- ko if: managerName().length === 0 -->            <a class="pm-modal-add-conversation-button btn btn-primary center" disabled="disabled">
                <div class="button-conversation-add"></div>
            </a>
<!-- /ko -->    </form>

                            <!-- ko with: conversationsPartial --><!-- ko foreach: getItems() -->            <div class="visible-xs">
                <div class="pm-modal-conversation-item clickable vertical-center" data-bind="css: { 'theme-panna-1': unreadMessagesCount() > 0 }, click: $root.setSelectedConversation.bind($root, $data)">
                    <div class="pm-modal-conversation-item-name font-xs semi-bold ellipsis" data-bind="text: theOtherUserPartial().name"></div>

                </div>
            </div>

                    <div class="pull-right" data-bind="visible: unreadMessagesCount() > 0 && $root.selectedConversationId() !== id, text: unreadMessagesCount()"></div>
                </div>
            </div>
<!-- /ko --><!-- /ko -->
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                    </div>
                </div>
<!-- ko with: selectedConversationPartial -->                    <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-7">

                            <img alt="" data-bind="attr : { src: theOtherUserPartial().getAvatarUrl() ? theOtherUserPartial().getAvatarUrl() : '/Images/icons/avatar_empty.jpg?v=3.209.0' }" class="avatar theOtherUserPartial().name" onerror="this.onerror = null; this.src = '/Images/icons/avatar_empty.jpg?v=3.209.0';" />

                        <a data-bind="text: theOtherUserPartial().name, attr: { href: Helper.replaceText(Urls.profile, [{ key: 'userId', value: theOtherUserPartial().id }])}"></a>
                    </div>
                    <div class="col-xs-6 col-sm-3">
<!-- ko if: !$root.selectedConversationPartial() || !$root.selectedConversationPartial().isReadOnly -->                            <button class="btn-new btn-wide btn-compact btn-danger"

<!-- ko if: !$root.selectedConversationPartial() || !$root.selectedConversationPartial().isReadOnly -->                                        <span class="respect-newline-characters">

<!-- /ko --><!-- /ko --><!-- ko if: $root.wasDecidedByPenalties() && !$root.sessionManagerHasWon() --><!-- ko if: $root.matchWasAgainstCpu() -->                    <span data-bind="text: Helper.replaceText('Draw {scoremanager} - {scoreopponent}, lost by penalties', [{ key: 'scoremanager', value: $root.getHomeScore() }, { key: 'scoreopponent', value: $root.getAwayScore() }])"></span>
<!-- /ko --><!-- ko ifnot: $root.matchWasAgainstCpu() -->                    <span data-bind="text: Helper.replaceText('Draw against manager {scoremanager} - {scoreopponent}, lost by penalties', [{ key: 'scoremanager', value: $root.getHomeScore() }, { key: 'scoreopponent', value: $root.getAwayScore() }])"></span>
<!-- /ko --><!-- /ko --><!-- ko ifnot: $root.wasDecidedByPenalties() --><!-- ko if: $root.matchWasAgainstCpu() -->                    <span data-bind="text: Helper.replaceText('Draw {scoremanager} - {scoreopponent}', [{ key: 'scoremanager', value: $root.getHomeScore() }, { key: 'scoreopponent', value: $root.getAwayScore() }])"></span>
<!-- /ko --><!-- ko ifnot: $root.matchWasAgainstCpu() -->                    <span data-bind="text: Helper.replaceText('Draw against manager {scoremanager} - {scoreopponent}', [{ key: 'scoremanager', value: $root.getHomeScore() }, { key: 'scoreopponent', value: $root.getAwayScore() }])"></span>
<!-- /ko --><!-- /ko --><!-- /ko --><!-- ko if: $root.getPlayedMatchResult() === MatchResult.Lost --><!-- ko if: $root.matchWasAgainstCpu() -->                <span data-bind="text: Helper.replaceText('Lost {scoremanager} - {scoreopponent}', [{ key: 'scoremanager', value: $root.getHomeScore() }, { key: 'scoreopponent', value: $root.getAwayScore() }])"></span>
<!-- /ko --><!-- ko ifnot: $root.matchWasAgainstCpu() -->                <span data-bind="text: Helper.replaceText('Lost against manager {scoremanager} - {scoreopponent}', [{ key: 'scoremanager', value: $root.getHomeScore() }, { key: 'scoreopponent', value: $root.getAwayScore() }])"></span>

        </div>
    </div>
</div></div></div></div></script>

    <div class="modal-header">

<!-- /ko -->        <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.SquadStrengthOpponentHelpText -->            <h3 class="modal-title">Squad strength opponent</h3>
<!-- /ko -->        <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.SquadStrengthHelpText -->            <h3 class="modal-title">Squad strength</h3>

<!-- /ko -->        <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.InPrizePoolQueueHelpText -->            <h3 class="modal-title">In queue</h3>

<!-- /ko -->        <!-- ko if: helpTextType() === HelpTextModal.Type.TacticsTackling -->            <h3 class="modal-title">Tackling</h3>
